doc:
Steve Burton (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Steve_Burton_(actor) 0 Jack Stephen Burton (born June 28, 1970) is an American actor, best known for his portrayal of Jason Morgan on General Hospital from 1991 to 2012 and 2017 to present, and Dylan McAvoy on The Young and the Restless from 2013 to 2017. He also voiced the character Cloud Strife in a wide range of Square Enix products, including Final Fantasy VII: Advent Children and the Kingdom Hearts series. In 2017, Burton returned to General Hospital in the role of Jason Morgan, under the alias of "Patient 6." Jack_Stephen_Burton ( born June_28_,_1970 ) is an_American_actor , best_known for his_portrayal of Jason_Morgan on General_Hospital from 1991 to 2012 and 2017 to present , and Dylan_McAvoy on The_Young and the_Restless from 2013 to 2017 . He also voiced the_character_Cloud_Strife in a_wide_range of Square_Enix_products , including Final_Fantasy_VII : Advent_Children and the_Kingdom_Hearts_series . In 2017 , Burton returned to General_Hospital in the_role of Jason_Morgan , under the_alias of " Patient_6 .
